name: Pastel de Queijo
description: Crispy fried pastry filled with cheese.
nutritionalInfo: Approximately 250 kcal per piece. High in fat and protein from cheese, moderate carbs from pastry.

name: Pastel de Carne
description: Golden fried pastry stuffed with seasoned beef.
nutritionalInfo: Approximately 260 kcal per piece. High in protein and fat, moderate carbs from pastry.

name: Açaí na Tigela
description: Refreshing açaí bowl with granola and banana.
nutritionalInfo: About 350 kcal per bowl. High in antioxidants, fiber from granola and banana, natural sugars present.

name: Queijo Coalho no Espeto
nutritionalInfo: Around 150 kcal per skewer. High in protein and calcium, moderate fat, low carbs.

name: Camarão Frito
description: Crispy fried shrimp served with lime.
nutritionalInfo: Approximately 200 kcal per serving. High in protein, moderate fat from frying, low carbs.

name: Milho Verde Cozido
description: Boiled corn on the cob with butter and salt.
nutritionalInfo: About 120 kcal per cob. Good source of fiber, vitamins, and carbohydrates; moderate fat if butter is added.

name: Coxinha de Frango
description: Fried chicken croquette with creamy filling.
nutritionalInfo: Approximately 180 kcal per piece. High in protein, moderate fat, and carbs from dough.

name: Bolinhos de Bacalhau
description: Codfish fritters, crunchy outside, soft inside.
nutritionalInfo: Around 220 kcal per serving. High in protein, moderate fat, contains some carbs from coating.

name: Tapioca Recheada
description: Tapioca pancake with sweet or savory fillings.
nutritionalInfo: Approximately 200 kcal per serving. Gluten-free, moderate carbs, protein varies depending on filling, low fat for plain tapioca.

name: Batata Frita
description: Golden crispy French fries, perfect to share.
nutritionalInfo: Around 300 kcal per serving. High in carbs and fat, low protein, contains some sodium.

name: Água de Coco
description: Fresh coconut water served straight from the coconut.
nutritionalInfo: About 45 kcal per glass (200ml). Low in fat, contains natural electrolytes like potassium and sodium, low sugar.

name: Suco de Laranja Natural
nutritionalInfo: Approximately 110 kcal per glass (250ml). Rich in vitamin C, contains natural sugars, low fat.

name: Refrigerante
nutritionalInfo: About 140 kcal per can (350ml). High in sugar, no protein, low micronutrients, contains carbonation.

name: Suco de Maracujá
nutritionalInfo: Approximately 100 kcal per glass (250ml). Good source of vitamin C and antioxidants, moderate natural sugars, low fat.

name: Mate Gelado
description: Iced Brazilian mate tea, slightly sweetened.
nutritionalInfo: About 50 kcal per glass (200ml). Low in fat, contains caffeine and antioxidants, moderate sugar if sweetened.
